Abstract.AbstractText: Kidney disease remains a condition with an increasing incidence, high morbidity and mortality associated with cardiovascular events. The incidence of end-stage renal disease is expected to increase. Despite of the technical improvement, dialysis never achieved a full clearance of the blood dialysis. Therefore, the demand for new renoprotective measures has never been greater. Here, we report new strategies for preventing renal damage.
